entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain with a few thunderstorms ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
